titleStmt.title: A warning to England, let London begin: To repent their iniquitie, & flie from their sin. [by] William Birch.
titleStmt.author: Birch, William, fl. 1562-1571.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London, in little Britaine :

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Top and bottom borders of printer's ornaments; one woodcut ill.
Imperfect: torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
